title: La Blue Nail Theory: il fenomeno che sta conquistando le tendenze beauty
description: The latest beauty trend taking over social media featuring various shades of blue nail polish as a statement of elegance and sophistication.

title: SAC & Co Sustainable Inclusive Denim
description: Athens-based denim brand since 1994 creating sustainable and inclusive jeans with extended sizing. Features eco-conscious practices, organic cotton, low-impact dyes and local Greek manufacturing with timeless designs.

title: Prada fur: A Manifesto
description: Prada's luxurious fur collection showcasing innovative designs and sustainable approaches to high-fashion fur garments.

title: Felpa VOGUE Dusty Pastels rosa antico con logo ricamato colorato
description: Limited edition Vogue sweatshirt in antique rose with colorful embroidered logo, featuring premium cotton and a relaxed fit.

title: Italian Made Fashion
description: Premium Italian fashion showcasing the finest craftsmanship and luxurious materials that define made-in-Italy excellence.
